DOC.brief_summary: In study , bioequivalence Epanutin Infatabs® 50 mg ( source Germany ) Dilantin Infatabs® 50 mg ( sourced Australia ) assess . This intended pivotal bioequivalence study .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Epanutin Infatabs 50 mg From Germany Are Similar Dilantin Infatabs 50 mg From Australia
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 21 55 year , inclusive . An informed consent document sign date subject . Evidence history clinically significant abnormality . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( e.g . gastrectomy ) .
